ASSINTEL 
 
Developers Alliance
goals__remit:
Elif Lab is a laboratory for studying, understanding and representing information and data. 
Our interests range from the identification of online and offline networks to the study of political dynamics, from the exploration of the social media world to the optimization of e-commerce and customer care services, from text and video content analysis to the management of online communities. 
We create web platforms, but also produce reports and visual display of data in order to understand, speculate and anticipate. 
We are specialized in analyzing institutional and political data, creating tools and reports to anticipate scenarios, map stakeholders, identify and engage people for grassroots advocacy.
relevant_communication:
Elif Lab implements and mantains Thinkingabout.EU ( www.thinkingabout.eu ), an online project born with the aim of studying the activity of all the European institutions. Gathering data from different sources, the website offers information about the members of the European Parliament, describing them by their most used keywords, categorizing their documents, analyzing their connections both online and offline (membership, social connections, collaborations). 
 
We also produce reports and analyses, studying the activity of the European institutions and we support interest groups and politicians providing them with tools and information in order to implement communication strategies, map stakeholders and anticipate scenarios.
